```{r load-data, include=F}
jobs <- readRDS("./jobs.rds")
states <-
    jobs |>
    dplyr::select(state_name, geometry) |>
    dplyr::group_by(state_name) |>
    dplyr::summarize(geometry = sf::st_union(geometry))
```

# [Map](#map)

```{r leaflet-jobs-map, out.width = "100%", fig.cap="The 48 contiguous states are included."}
jobs_map <-
    jobs |>
    leaflet() |>
    addProviderTiles(providers$CartoDB.Positron, group = "Positron") |>
    setView(-77.301028, 38.849602, zoom = 8) |>
    addPolygons(
        data = jobs,
        color = jobs$color,
        stroke = FALSE,
        smoothFactor = 0.2,
        fillOpacity = .5,
        label = paste0(
            jobs$namelsad,
            " ",
            round(jobs$avg_ann_pct_change, 1),
            "%"
        )
    ) |>
    addPolygons(
            data = states,
            fill = FALSE,
            weight = 1.5,
            color = "black"
    ) |> 
    addLegend(
        "bottomright",
        colors = brewer.pal(7, "RdBu"),
        labels = c(
            "-3.2% to -0.5%",
            "-0.5% to 0.0%",
            "0.0% to 0.4%",
            "0.4% to 0.8%",
            "0.8% to 1.4%",
            "1.4% to 2.5%",
            "2.5% to 98.7%"
        ),
        # values = jobs$cut_pct,
        title = "Avg. Annual Job <br> Growth 1990 - 2021",
        labFormat = labelFormat(prefix = ""),
        opacity = .9
    )
frameWidget(jobs_map, height = 500)
```
